item.title: Salary Negotiation - Make More Money, Be More Valued - Kalzumeus Software
item.description: Salary Negotiation - Make More Money, Be More Valued - Kalzumeus Software Your model is broken Virtually any amount of money available to you personally is mouse droppings to your prospective employer.
